title: Melissa de la Cruz & Ally Carter: Meet the Authors
itunes:subtitle: Two young-adult fiction superstars discuss their books.
itunes:summary: : Melissa de la Cruz is the bestselling author of many critically acclaimed and award-winning novels for teens, including the Au Pairs series and the Blue Bloods series. Ally Carter is the author of the best-selling Gallagher Girls series and Heist Society.
itunes:keywords: Melissa de la Cruz, Ally Carter, meet the author, apple store, apple store events, authors, books
